entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 8:25PM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Washburn and southwestern Sawyer Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 825 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Shell Lake, or 7 miles southeast of Spooner, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated.
